li.label: changed
li.description: All the sounds are so loud, and kind of scary! AAH, was that you? Who's there?

li.label: changed
li.description: I feel so graceful, like the ruler of the forest.

li.label: changed
li.description: AAH! Who was that!? I heard you! Run away! I hate this!

li.label: changed
li.description: So regal! This is great, but not quite all there yet.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm not so jumpy all the time now, phew.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I could have had some nice antlers...

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm sorry for being so scared all the time, everyone!

li.label: reverted
li.description: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?

li.label: Deer face
li.description: Look at my nose, it's just so...animal.

li.label: Deer face
li.description: Berries are soooo good.

li.label: Deer face
li.description: I could really use some buckshot right now.

li.label: Deer ears
li.description: Any noise causes them to flick up...

li.label: Deer ears
li.description: I can hear predators so easily now...uh, I mean, raiders!

li.label: Deer ears
li.description: Guns really hurt my ears...

li.label: Short tail
li.description: It'd be nice if it didn't flick up whenever people scare me...

li.label: Short tail
li.description: Flick, flick, flick, flick...oh, sorry!

li.label: Short tail
li.description: At least I can hide it.

li.label: Antlers
li.description: They would be fine if they weren't constantly getting stuck in door frames.

li.label: Antlers
li.description: This is awesome! I feel like I could just ram into things and destroy them!

li.label: Antlers
li.description: This is ridiculous! How am I supposed to even get on shirts now?

li.label: Antlers
li.description: Closer to the forest, and closer to my dream.
